price: Àwọn tó sì ṣàì gbàgbọ́, tí wọ́n tún pe àwọn āyah Wa ní irọ́; àwọn wọ̀nyẹn ni ìyà tí í yẹpẹrẹ ẹ̀dá sì wà fún.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مُّهِينٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā fa-ulāika lahum ʿadhābun muhīnun
